name: Color Shooter - Match and Clear Puzzle Game
name_original: Color Shooter - Match and Clear Puzzle Game
description:
Tap to shoot! Clear more and more colors! Enjoy the addictive mini puzzle now!
--Start Easy--
Tap to shoot the ball. Match the same color to clear the colorful spinning wheel!

--Get Harder--
More and more colors appear on the wheel! Faster and faster the wheel spins! Even one little mistake will let you restart!

--Challenge It--
200+ increasingly difficult levels! How far can you go? Download it and have a try!

Features
-FREE puzzle game for all ages
-CLEAN and colorful game graphics
-EASY to start and get harder
-NEW way to enjoy puzzle game

Contact Us:
- If you have any question or suggestion, please feel free to contact us: colorshooter_98_1@histudiosupport.com
